metadata.Title: CVE-2013-0303 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
Unspecified vulnerability in core/ajax/translations.php in ownCloud before4.0.12 and 4.5.x before 4.5.6 allows remote authenticated users to executearbitrary PHP code via unknown vectors.  NOTE: this entry has been SPLITdue to different affected versions. The core/settings.php issue is coveredby CVE-2013-7344.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-0303` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

owncloud - 5.0.4debian-0ubuntu1
owncloud-mysql - 5.0.4debian-0ubuntu1
owncloud-pgsql - 5.0.4debian-0ubuntu1
owncloud-sqlite - 5.0.4debian-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: owncloud package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.0.4debian-0ubuntu1').
